mapper.update:
update trans_db
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
network_area_id = #{networkAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
network_area_name = #{networkAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_type = #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_ip = #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
db_port = #{dbPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},

user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trans_db set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, network_area_id = #{networkAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, network_area_name = #{networkAreaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_type = #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_ip = #{dbIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, db_port = #{dbPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, db_name = #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from trans_db
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
select from trans_db where name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from trans_db where db_type = #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from trans_db where id in (select transmit_db_id from trans_busi_db where channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
